summary: Pede the Centipede in Memeville - In the lush world of Memeville, Pede the centipede was the best friend of Pepe the Frog. With his hundred tiny legs and vibrant colors, Pede was always by Pepe's side, leading them on thrilling adventures through forests and streams. When an internet troll threatened Memeville, Pede's agility and loyalty helped Pepe devise a plan to outsmart the intruder, restoring peace and harmony. Their triumph cemented Pede's reputation as a hero, but to Pepe, he was simply a true friend. Together, Pede and Pepe continued to explore and protect Memeville, their friendship a shining example of courage and loyalty.
